subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Under a new coordinator, the Steelers finished with 48 sacks and 17 interceptions, their highest totals since 2010. But mistakes pop up when they can’t get reach the ball or the quarterback.
snippet: Under a new coordinator, the Steelers finished with 48 sacks and 17 interceptions, their highest totals since 2010. But mistakes pop up when they can’t get reach the ball or the quarterback.
